mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (reservation_id, booked_count, mu_sch_id, customer_id, total_cost, reservation_cancel, reservation_time,payment_method,merchant_uid) VALUES (#{reservation_id}, #{booked_count}, #{mu_sch_id}, #{customer_id}, #{total_cost}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT,#{payment_method},#{merchant_uid})
mapper.update: update reservation set reservation_cancel=1 where reservation_id= #{param1}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where customer_id=#{param1}
select customer_id from reservation where reservation_id = #{reservation_id}
select * from reservation where customer_id=#{param1} and reservation_cancel=0 order by reservation_time
select count(*) from reservation where customer_id=#{param1} and reservation_cancel=0
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE customer_id=#{param1} and reservation_cancel=0 order by reservation_time desc OFFSET (#{param2} - 1) * #{param3} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{param3} ROWS ONLY

select count(*) from reservation where customer_id=#{param1} and reservation_cancel=0 and reservation_time BETWEEN #{param2} AND (TO_DATE(#{param3}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND)

SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE customer_id=#{param1} and reservation_cancel=0 and reservation_time BETWEEN #{param4} AND (TO_DATE(#{param5}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND) order by reservation_time desc OFFSET (#{param2} - 1) * #{param3} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{param3} ROWS ONLY
